post.author: Kelly J Lee
post.content:
2005 MARKHAM RIBFEST
  & BLUES FESTIVAL
(Markham, Ontario, Canada)
http://www.markhamribfest.com/

Markham Fairgrounds
(Elgin Mills & McCowan)

Friday, July 15, 2005 (5 pm to 11:30 pm)
Saturday, July 16, 2005 (11 am to 11:30 pm)
Sunday, July 17, 2005 (11 am to 6 pm)

Free Admission


Come on out for a weekend of award winning ribs and chicken prepared by some of the best Ribbers in North America


There will be hot dogs, hamburgers, French fries, corn on the cob, ice cream, candy floss and lots of other treats for the kids.


Come and visit the York Region Community Safety Village


Live blues music on stage all weekend.


Beer Tent will be serving ice cold beer to go with your ribs.
Non-alcoholic beverages and lemonade will also be available.


Pony rides for children.


Free admission and parking on site for over 8000 cars.


No pets are allowed on the fair grounds
post.title: 2005 MARKHAM RIBFEST & BLUES FESTIVAL
